title.native: ゴリラの神から加護された令嬢は王立騎士団で可愛がられる
title.romaji: Gorilla no Kami kara Kago sareta Reijou wa Ouritsu Kishidan de Kawaigarareru

description:
Sophia, a timid daughter of a count, just wanted a peaceful life, but the Gorilla God had other plans. Blessed with unmatched strength, she’s thrust into the Royal Knight Order, turning her quiet days into chaos. Now, she must juggle school, the knight life, and her overwhelming power. Who knew gorilla strength could be so complicated?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Athletics
tags.description: Centers around sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, or walking.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

title.native: ゴリラの神から加護された令嬢は王立騎士団で可愛がられる

name.native: アイザック・シーアン
アーシェント・アードラー
ヴィクトル・ヴォルク

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/01_chan)

He graduated from Yoyogi Animation school and joined Studio Junio afterwards. After leaving Studio Junio, he became a freelancer and often works with Studio Sunrise and GONZO.
In 2008, him and former GONZO producer Ikeda Touyo founded Encourage Films Co., Ltd, with a capital of 5 million yen.
Ikeda Touyo would serve as the representative director and president of Encourage Films. 
With the death of Ikeda Touyo, on February 17, 2013, he was appointed as the representative director and CEO of Encourage Films.
Twitter | Website (artist page) __Seima Iwahashi__ is a Japanese composer, arranger, director and orechestrator. He is a member of the music production team, Elements Garden.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Megumi_Ogata) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/megumi_ogata_official/) | [Website](https://www.emou.net)

Ogata attended Tokai University, but left due to lack of interest. They then began working as a musical actress, attending the same classes alongside [Rumi Kasahara](https://anilist.co/staff/95996/) and [Shiho Niiyama](https://anilist.co/staff/95724/). Because of their husky voice, they are often typecast as either young men and boys or tomboyish females. It is also because of this that they are sometimes referred as "Aniki" (big brother) by fans.

In a speech at the 16th Seiyu Awards on March 5, 2022, Ogata had shared that they had been wary to accept "Best Leading Actress" as they mostly played boy characters and do not refer to themselves as an actress. Ogata also shared that "There is so much talk about being 'genderless' nowadays and there are voice actors in the industry who have come out. And like myself, there are people out there who go on about their daily lives mostly not thinking of themselves as women."

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Fidelio Aureus Magnus - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
Samantha Herek is a producer and actress.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/caitlinsvoice) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/caitlinsvoice/) | [Myspace](https://myspace.com/caitlintiffany) | [Blog](https://kiristokyoto.livejournal.com/)

An American voice actor, voice director, and script writer for Funimation, New Generation Pictures, and Bang Zoom! Entertainment. She's been working in the anime industry since 2004. She grew up in the San Diego area, California, and has been married to Tony Patterson since 2009. Outside of voice acting, Caitlin has worked as an ESL teacher in Spain.
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
